title: How to charge cell phone batteries externally - Quora

response.answer_text: Buy or build a charger. I make a socket for the battery out of wood or plastic and design a charger to fit my desires. I prefer charging at a lower current over a longer time rather than a quick charge. Less stress on the battery. I have rechargeable batteries that are 25 years old.

Some phones have removable batteries. Some of those have external chargers that fit the batteries. I used to use a high-capacity battery for my Samsung S2, it didn't fit their charger, though the “normal” battery did.
